question:
Domhnall reviles the color green. Deano is addicted to solving riddles. Farhan finds fulfillment in the color olive. Makin scorns astronautics. Darrie puts up with recycling. Suheyb ignores motorhomes. Marcquis dismisses the color taupe. Cesar dislikes composing music. Saim extols graffiti art. Tanner longs for history. Keilan regrets motorcycles. Klevis is crazy about sculpting. Olaf curses boats. Alyas dotes playing lacrosse. Clement shrugs off space shuttles. Leonardo is keen on balloons. Muhammed regrets visiting theme parks. Azlan is passionate about cats. Deagan shrugs off mountain biking. Munro revels in the color sienna. Loui respects canoes. Mickey basks in manga. Matt is apathetic about sewing. Abdur-Rahman favors embroidery. Darwyn finds pleasure in learning magic tricks. Millar disapproves of sweeping the porch. Donald scorns jazz dancing. Umar is crazy about whales. Cormac approves of playing the mandolin. Ralph covets cinema. Sinai prizes monkeys. Nathan embraces motorcycles. Lucian favors virtual concerts. Glen prizes cows. Deshawn mocks virtual concerts. Kienan execrates chickens. Carrich glorifies pastries. Tymoteusz finds fulfillment in playing tennis. Binod scoffs at dusting the furniture. Zennon detests sandwich. 
Who detests sandwich? Reply with a name enclosed within triple angle brackets, like <<<name>>>.
